name: PUSS!
description: Insane, absurd and intense avoid-'em up game about a cat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 750 MB available space
